Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive/Hafnia Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hafnia Way and Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Hafnia Way runs south from here, connecting Nagaritha Drive to Golden Dolphin Way. This short road runs past the Marina Plaza shopping center and the Golden Dolphin Inn. Nagaritha Drive continues to the east and west. To the north is the Regalia Convent. The entrance to the convent is located off of Marina Way, west of here.
